column4: hi, is there anyway to stop ubuntu moving the selected window to the next workspace
this is on ubuntu 11, seems to have just started doing it
i'm really confused why its doing it, as 'only on this workspace'
is selected
Do you know what "workspace" means?
You porbably have at least 2 workspaces.  You can have a GUI window showing on one or more workspaces.
i hope so
yeah, what i don't want is the currently selected application
to move to the next workspace
To move to the next workspace is what it says.  If it is on workspace1 and you move to next workspace, it will go to workspace2
it never used to do that
is there no way to stop it from doing that, usr13
Well, it is just an option.  You don't have to use it.
what i'm saying is, it always moves that window usr13
there doesn't seem to be an option to stop it
from doing that
Well, I don't know about that. Sorry.
I suppose if you were using workspace2 during your last session, you'll start out on workspace2 on next one.
thats not the issue though, usr13, its the fact the selected application is moving with me, when i move workspace
But does it really matter?  (Does it matter which workspace you use for any particular GUI application?)
yes, its very annoying
Then just use one workspace
